tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE duplicate_content_issues (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    url VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    status ENUM('duplicate', 'resolved'),
    found_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DuplicateIssues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    duplicate_id INT NOT NULL,
    issue_description TEXT NOT NULL,
    resolution TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (duplicate_id) REFERENCES DuplicatePages(duplicate_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Duplicate_Content_URL (
    url_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    url VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    report_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES Duplicate_Content_Report(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Content_Issues_Log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    issue_description TEXT,
    url_id INT,
    fix_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (url_id) REFERENCES Duplicate_Content_URL(url_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (fix_id) REFERENCES Duplicate_Content_Fix(fix_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Content_Quality (
    quality_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    url_id INT,
    content_quality VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (url_id) REFERENCES Duplicate_Content_URL(url_id)
);
